lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes hit his third home run in two games since his return, Noah Syndergaard pitched eight scoreless innings, and the Mets gained a split of a four-game series in San Francisco.

headline.main: Syndergaard Helps Mets Shut Out Giants as Cespedes Homers Again

snippet: Yoenis Cespedes hit his third home run in two games since his return, Noah Syndergaard pitched eight scoreless innings, and the Mets gained a split of a four-game series in San Francisco....
abstract: New York Mets defeat San Francisco Giants, 2-0.
